desc.en: Chongqing Rail Transit (CRT) is an urban rail transit system serving Chongqing, China. Its first line was officially put into operation on June 18, 2005, making Chongqing the ninth city in the Chinese mainland and the first in the western region to open urban rail transit. As of December 2024, Chongqing Rail Transit has opened 13 lines, including the Chongqing Rail Transit Loop Line, Line 1, Line 2, Line 3 (including Konggang Line), Line 4, Line 5, Line 6, Guobo Line, Line 9, Line 10, Line 18, the suburban railway Jiangtiao Line, and the suburban railway Bitong Line, with an operating mileage of 575.5 kilometers (including the Chongqing Yunba demonstration line in the operating mileage); there are a total of 263 stations (transfer stations are not recounted), including 45 transfer stations. As of December 2024, there are 10 lines under construction in Chongqing Rail Transit. In 2023, the annual passenger volume of Chongqing Rail Transit was 1.326 billion person-times. As of 2024, the highest daily passenger volume of Chongqing Rail Transit was 6.148 million person-times on December 31, 2024, exceeded 6 million for the first time. As of 14:56 on April 14, 2024, the cumulative passenger flow of Chongqing Rail Transit exceeded 10 billion. In June 2024, 5G signals covered all stations of Chongqing Rail Transit. Starting from July 19, three-day tickets began to be sold throughout the network of Chongqing Rail Transit.
desc.zh-Hans: 重庆轨道交通（Chongqing Rail Transit，CRT）是服务于中国重庆市境内的城市轨道交通系统，其第一条线路于2005年6月18日正式开通投入运营，使重庆成为中国内地第九座、西部地区第一座开通城市轨道交通的城市。截至2024年12月，重庆轨道交通已开通13条线路，包括重庆轨道交通环线、1号线、2号线、3号线（含空港线）、4号线、5号线、6号线、国博线、9号线、10号线、18号线、市郊铁路江跳线，市域铁路璧铜线，运营里程575.5千米（运营里程含重庆云巴示范线）；共设车站263座（换乘站不重复计算），其中换乘站45座。截至2024年12月，重庆轨道交通在建线路共10条。2023年，重庆轨道交通年客运量为13.26亿人次。截至2024年12月，重庆轨道交通日最高客运量为2024年12月31日的614.8万人次，首次突破600万人次大关。截至2024年4月14日14点56分，重庆轨道交通累计客流突破百亿大关，达到100亿。2024年6月，重庆轨道交通车站实现5G信号全覆盖。7月19日起，重庆轨道交通开始全线网销售三日票。
